references.paper_title: Deep Unsupervised Learning using Nonequilibrium Thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is foundational for diffusion probabilistic models, introducing the theoretical framework of using nonequilibrium thermodynamics for deep unsupervised learning.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a highly influential model architecture for generating high-quality images.

references.paper_title: Score-Based Generative Modeling through Stochastic Differential Equations
references.reason: This paper introduced a powerful alternative framework for score-based generative modeling, using stochastic differential equations, which improved efficiency and sample quality.

references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced the field by demonstrating the generation of high-resolution images using latent diffusion models, addressing a key limitation of previous approaches.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic Text-to-Image Diffusion Models with Deep Language Understanding
references.reason: This paper showcased the impressive capabilities of diffusion models in generating photorealistic images from text descriptions, highlighting the potential for advanced applications in image generation.
